title: WearShell
summary: Execute code directly on Android Wear.
developerAddress:

description: WearShell executes BeanShell code directly on an Android Wear device.Mainly aimed at developers to test some code WearShell can also be used to automate tasks on a Wear device by using Tasker of just to explore your smartwatch.The app provides a web interface to test code directly, samples and developer instructions to call WearShell from third party apps are also provided within the web interface.XDA Developers: http://goo.gl/9kHFjCAdditional BeanShell commands can be found here: https://goo.gl/2mA1uU
descriptionHTML:
WearShell executes BeanShell code directly on an Android Wear device.
Mainly aimed at developers to test some code WearShell can also be used to automate tasks on a Wear device by using Tasker of just to explore your smartwatch.

The app provides a web interface to test code directly, samples and developer instructions to call WearShell from third party apps are also provided within the web interface.

XDA Developers: http://goo.gl/9kHFjC
Additional BeanShell commands can be found here: https://goo.gl/2mA1uU
comments: One of the best android wear power user apps This app helps add an extra layer of control back on my android wear device. Really dig it.
Excellent!  Makes Android Wear much more useful
All what you need to automate your Smartwatch
super awesome app to squeeze full potential out of a smartwatch combine this app with tasker, read joschi70's xda forum, get all the wearshell command collections he posted and wow
